channel.title: Random on Stuff I've Figured Out
channel.description: Recent content in Random on Stuff I've Figured Out

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Obligatory first post: Hello, world. I’ve chosen to follow the GitHub masses and publish this blog with Brandon Mathis’ most excellent Octopress. Next on the agenda is to port a number of my wiki notes and how-to’s to a more … revision controlled outlet: GitHub. Stay tuned - Eric
